title: Distance Learning Design and Motivation Strategy Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Experience using digital learning tools and intermediate or advanced language proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners Possess Advanced Expertise in the Language Domain, with Performance Measured Through Project-Based Assessment. Digital Devices Are Provided, and Motivational Scaffolding Strategies (Chat-Based Study Groups, Instructor Office Hours) Are Applied

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% participation rates in remote learning environments using motivational scaffolding techniques
Learners form chat-based study groups to share learning tasks and provide feedback at least twice weekly
Learners adjust learning plans at least twice using instructor office hours, improving project completion rates by 15%
Learners design self-directed learning strategies to achieve grades of B+ or higher in final project assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
